sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of educational outcome occurring in a school
message_1: A school has 2500 students. Out of those students, it is estimated that 60% will graduate in the next 4 years. What is the probability that any randomly selected student from this school will graduate in the next 4 years?
message_2: The probability that any randomly selected student from this school will graduate in the next 4 years is 60% or 0.6.
